title: Trump calls coyotes 'vicious' -- Impeach!
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

President Donald Trump, in a speech before the United Nations, called out those who smuggle illegals into America — coyotes, as they’re colloquially known — as “vicious” individuals, bent on taking advantage both financially and sexually of the poor and downtrodden.

And now he must be impeached.

Why not? The left wants him impeached for everything else. Might as well add this to the list — particularly since he was wearing a red tie, white shirt and navy suit while speaking. Proof positive of his racism. ‘Cause nothing says aggressive racism like donning red, white and blue.

Trump has ducked his punishment for far too long.

There was Russia collusion.

There was Russia obstruction of justice.

There was Russia conspiracy, Russia conflict of interest and now, post-Robert Mueller report-slash-testimony and findings of No Collusion, the Ukraine affair.

In between? There was Brett Kavanaugh the Rapist, Part One, followed by Brett Kavanaugh the Rapist, Part Two — impeachable offenses, both. And not just for Kavanaugh; for the man who brought us Kavanaugh — Trump.

And now? Now comes the “vicious” rhetoric. Which, when you think about it, is pretty much the same as labelling Hispanics — heck, all South Americans, really — as dirty scum bucket tramps.

Impeach Trump. Trump hates South Americans.

“When you undermine border security,” Trump said, in a special U.N. message to open border advocates, “you are undermining human rights and human dignity.”

Impeach! Or, as Bill Weld, ex-Massachusetts governor, might say: Just put him to death for treason already.

Either, or. Potatoes, potahtoes.

But seriously, Trump just called South Americans undignified. And as everybody knows, that’s KKK code for dogs.
